items.title: Goldman Sachs Group (GS) Advises F&F Co. On TaylorMade Acquisition Strategy
items.description: Goldman Sachs Group (GS) experienced a 36% rise in its share price over the last quarter. This substantial growth came as the company was engaged as the financial advisor for F&F Co. Ltd.'s potential acquisition of TaylorMade, amid positive market trends with the Dow Jones, S&P 500, and Nasdaq reaching all-time highs. GS also reported strong second-quarter earnings and a dividend increase, likely bolstering investor confidence. Additionally, the company’s inclusion in the Russell Top 50 Index...
